JobFullDesc: Are you passionate about helping those around you be more effective? Do you think about technology and data as a way to increase efficiency and change how a business operates? We are looking for candidates that share our passion for tackling complexity head-on, to help build platforms that can scale through multiple orders of magnitude. As a Product Technical Program Manager, you will work with teams of talented engineers, product managers, data scientists, and other cross-functional team members to build easy-to-use and effective advertising, commerce, and consumer experiences for businesses across our family of Facebook Apps (Facebook and Instagram).We are looking for experienced technical leaders who can support complex multi-platform development efforts at consumer scale, while maintaining clarity of product vision and organisational awareness. As a product TPM, you'll commit to hands-on learning the team's technology, breaking down product requirements into engineering milestones. You’ll communicate progress and drive program execution effectively through cross-functional collaboration to achieve business goals.You’ll be an integral part of the team who will drive system
